Articles.Content:
If I copy a large ship into 1.3,  it explodes as soon as 'physics easing' is finished. I have looked around the internet but have not found a good answer. I am truly open to suggestions.

 

Thanks!

-jimc
A lot of ship-explosion bugs have been fixed in the 1.3.1 prerelease. However, your mod list may or may not currently support 1.3.1.
